page.title: 18From The Notice Board.
page.content:
FORGET-ME-NOT CLUB The monthly meeting was held in the village hall last Wednesday afternoon. Mrs.J Rowbottom, president, welcomed 41 members. Donkey Derby was played and Mrs.Joan Rhodes was the organiser. The competition was the best opened rose, judged by Mr.Peter Van-de-Werf, of Surfleet. Men's winners were Mr.H.Taylor, Mr.C.Reynolds and Mr.F.Smith.
A BLIND darts match held at the "Crown Hotel" on behalf of Bold raised Â£42. Mr.D.Cooper, chairman of Bold, accepted the money from the organiser, Mr.G.Riley. Competition winners were C.McGill, D.Brown, L.Parker, P.Haresign, C.Pearson and C.Pepper.
D.J.Waterfield.
